subtitleNullable: Assessing Listener, Artist and Track Characteristics
descriptionNullable:
_____
# Effects of Electronic Music Diversity
### Assessing Listener, Artist and Track Characteristics
By  [[source]](https://zenodo.org/record/4436649#.Y9Y58NJBwUE)
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset comprises survey responses from participants aged 18 and over who have a deep understanding of electronic music. Its purpose is to explore how perceptions of diversity in the genre are shaped by listener, artist and track characteristics. Multiple-choice questions serve as a way to measure participant familiarity with popular electronic music artists, while multiple sessions evaluate appreciations for various tracks and artists based on their levels of perceived diversity. The data obtained from this survey provides unique insights into how listeners’ backgrounds, musical preferences and knowledge can affect appreciation for different forms of expression within the ever-evolving world of electronic music. We invite you to explore these results as they further our collective understanding of diversity within the genre on both an individual level and beyond

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> This dataset is designed to measure perceptions of diversity in electronic music based on listener, artist and track characteristics. To use this dataset you will need to understand the structure of the questions and data points in order to query and analyze it. In this guide, we will provide step-by-step instructions on how to do so. 
> 
> - Guide Users Through The Data Structure: First familiarise yourself with the columns of data in the dataset including any “optional” fields. Check which types are numeric (e.g.,”ARTIST task 1″) or categorical (e.g., “Do you know these? [Kamila Govorčin]”). Note that datasets often includes both numerical values as well as text descriptions; take time to ensure you understand what each field contains before proceeding further with your analysis. 
> - Pin Point Your Research Goals: Knowing your research objective is key for utilizing a properly structured dataset for better results – one should consider their research goals before ever beginning an analysis such as what topics or trends they would like explore, which values they would like to compare against one another, if applicable correlation comparisons are available etc…  
> 3 Geographical Representation: A particularly interesting aspect of this dataset regards geographical representation; it determines whether our survey participants represent a particular country or region firstly - based on where they indicated their origin when filling out the survey – but alsobased upon which artists/tracks were most familiar according their answers provided through subsequent questions included within our survey scopes accordingly we recommend reframing those queries by geographic regions taking into account both factors mentioned above e g try creating queries tackling individual countries within those regions instead utilizing queries regarding countrywide averages 
> 
> 4 Formulate Questions & Queries : Once all steps mentioned above have been considered take time formulating exact questions as well as some pseudo code/queries ensuring thatyou answer only very specific points contained within our survey results e g If I wanted Show gender differences towards artists specified in my initial query then I might write something similar Gender Diffferences For Artists X Y amp Z  OR SELECT * FROM SurveyResults WHERE gender RESPONDENT quotemalequot Artist nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp INX Y Z 5 Get Familiar With Statistical Processes Utilizing Software : When working with big datasets containing potentially hundreds if not thousands amountingof entries understanding various possible methods becoming more knowledgeableabout statistical processessoftware such Excel Pandas Tableau amp others in order help visualize organize filter

### Research Ideas
> - An analysis of listener familiarity with different genres of electronic music and its impact on the perception of diversity in the genre. 
> - Identifying correlations between artist and track characteristics with the perceived level of diversity in music. 
> - Determining whether certain countries or geographical regions are more likely to have higher levels of diversity in regards to electronic music than others, based on demographic information from respondent's answers about their locations

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://zenodo.org/record/4436649#.Y9Y58NJBwUE)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> **License: [CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) - Public Domain Dedication](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)**
> No Copyright - You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission. [See Other Information](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

### Columns

**File: Data_Release_v-0.2.csv**
| Column name                                    | Description                                                                                                                         |
|:-----------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **[Optional] What is your age?**               | This column contains the age of the survey participant. (Numeric)                                                                   |
| **[Optional] Where are you from? **            | This column contains the place of origin of the survey participant. (Categorical)                                                   |
| **Do you know these? [Kraftwerk]**             | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Kraftwerk. (Categorical)             |
| **Do you know these? [Daft Punk]**             | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Daft Punk. (Categorical)             |
| **Do you know these? [Tangerine Dream]**       | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Tangerine Dream. (Categorical)       |
| **Do you know these? [Goldie]**                | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Goldie. (Categorical)                |
| **Do you know these? [Orbital]**               | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Orbital. (Categorical)               |
| **Do you know these? [Skrillex]**              | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Skrillex. (Categorical)              |
| **Do you know these? [Deadmau5]**              | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Deadmau5. (Categorical)              |
| **Do you know these? [Nur Jaber]**             | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Nur Jaber. (Categorical)             |
| **Do you know these? [DJ Rachael]**            | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist DJ Rachael. (Categorical)            |
| **Do you know these? [Deena Abdelwahed]**      | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Deena Abdelwahed. (Categorical)      |
| **Do you know these? [Loraine James]**         | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Loraine James. (Categorical)         |
| **Do you know these? [Ibaaku]**                | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Ibaaku. (Categorical)                |
| **Do you know these? [Upgrayedd Smurphy]**     | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Upgrayedd Smurphy. (Categorical)     |
| **Do you know these? [Sandunes]**              | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Sandunes. (Categorical)              |
| **Do you know these? [Kerano]**                | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Kerano. (Categorical)                |
| **TRACK task 2**                               | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the track's diversity on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)                          |
| **TRACK task 3**                               | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the track's originality on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)                        |
| **TRACK task 4**                               | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the track's overall quality on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)                    |
| **ARTIST task 1**                              | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the artist's diversity on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)                         |
| **ARTIST task 2**                              | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the artist's originality on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)                       |
| **ARTIST task 3**                              | This column contains the survey participant's rating                                                                                |
| **BOTH task 2**                                | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the track and artist's diversity on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)               |
| **BOTH task 3**                                | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the track and artist's originality on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)             |
| **BOTH task 4**                                | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the track and artist's overall quality on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)         |
| **Do you know these? [The Chemical Brothers]** | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist The Chemical Brothers. (Categorical) |
| **Do you know these? [DJ Shadow]**             | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist DJ Shadow. (Categorical)             |
| **Do you know these? [Aphex Twin]**            | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Aphex Twin. (Categorical)            |
| **Do you know these? [Roni Size]**             | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Roni Size. (Categorical)             |
| **Do you know these? [Underworld]**            | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Underworld. (Categorical)            |
| **Do you know these? [Dj Rashad]**             | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Dj Rashad. (Categorical)             |
| **Familiarity Score**                          | This column contains the survey participant's familiarity score with the artist Dj Rashad. (Numeric)                                |
| **TRACK task 1**                               | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the track's diversity on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)                          |
| **ARTIST task 4**                              | This column contains the survey participant's rating of the artist's diversity on a scale of 1-5. (Numeric)                         |
| **Do you know these? [Vangelis]**              | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Vangelis. (Categorical)              |
| **Do you know these? [Moby]**                  | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Moby. (Categorical)                  |
| **Do you know these? [The Prodigy]**           | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist The Prodigy. (Categorical)           |
| **Do you know these? [Kamila Govorčin]**       | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Kamila Govorčin. (Categorical)       |
| **Do you know these? [Echo Deep]**             | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist                                      |
| **Do you know these? [Faded Ghost]**           | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Faded Ghost. (Categorical)           |
| **Do you know these? [AYN]**                   | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist AYN. (Categorical)                   |
| **Do you know these? [Amine K]**               | This column contains information on whether the survey participant is familiar with the artist Amine K. (Categorical)               |

> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
